Text:
So many ppl leeched and not one comment, for shame :(

Thanks for the upload. IMO this is PF's finest work, and since its not on Spotify, I only had it on vinyl until today :-)
hey man, I want to thank you for uploading PF's music for us. I love the succinctness of your files, too. all music, no commercials or bullshit.
Thanks for posting, pipe1500. Ah, the summer of 75 when I spent the best part of the summer listening to this and Snow Goose.
